name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
name_original: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
description:
Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace is an action-adventure game developed by Big Ape Productions. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by LucasArts Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace is available on PC and PlayStation. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
